categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Warrior was an Imperial-class Star Destroyer set to rendezvous with an Imperial convoy carrying supplies and slaves by Mon Calamari at about 2 BBY. The Warrior arrived early only to discover a Rebel force attempting to liberate the slaves. In responce, TIE/LN starfighters were launched against the Rebels. One Rebel pilot, Halley Kadorto, was able to hold off the TIEs until the Alliance escaped with the slaves.
